item.title: Why doesn't this work? :/
item.dc:creator: @KingLuke KingLuke
item.description:
@KingLuke wrote:

I know, I only want it so that if you use the Chisel on the Bronze armour set then it will work. But now that I think about it I think it will be a good idea to have it both ways.

EDIT: I have just added the code so that it should work either way but it still says “Nothing interesting happens.” I’m still looking for help on this.

Read full topic

item.title: Why doesn't this work? :/
item.dc:creator: @antirock75 antirock75
item.description:
@antirock75 wrote:

[quote=“KingLuke, post:1, topic:455023”]Hey I am currently doing some work on the Eclipse source and I thought it would be cool to add it where when you use a chisel on an armour set if gives you a full helm, platebody, kiteshield and platelegs. So I went into my ItemOnItemHandler.java and added the code for it, However when I compiled it and tested my new feature in-game it didn’t work. It said “Nothing interesting happens.” What is wrong?

if (itemUsed == 1755 && itemUsedWith == 11814) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(11814, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(1155, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1117, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1189, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1075, 1); player.sendMessage("You recieve a lovely bronze armour set!"); return; }[/quote]Your code only works if you use 1755 on 11814. Won’t work if you click 11814 first.

Read full topic

item.title: Why doesn't this work? :/
item.dc:creator: @KingLuke KingLuke
item.description:
@KingLuke wrote:

Hey I am currently doing some work on the Eclipse source and I thought it would be cool to add it where when you use a chisel on an armour set if gives you a full helm, platebody, kiteshield and platelegs. So I went into my ItemOnItemHandler.java and added the code for it, However when I compiled it and tested my new feature in-game it didn’t work. It said “Nothing interesting happens.” What is wrong?

if (itemUsed == 1755 && itemUsedWith == 11814) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(11814, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(1155, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1117, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1189, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1075, 1); player.sendMessage("You recieve a lovely bronze armour set!"); return; }

Read full topic
